00019 #ifndef _FFT_ACTION_PHASE_DIFFERENTIATION_HPP_cm101106_
00020 #define _FFT_ACTION_PHASE_DIFFERENTIATION_HPP_cm101106_
00021 
00022 #include <iostream>
00023 #include <string>
00024 #include <stdexcept>
00025 #include <boost/noncopyable.hpp>
00026 #include <boost/property_tree/ptree.hpp>
00027 #include <boost/shared_ptr.hpp>
00028 #include <boost/make_shared.hpp>
00029 #include <boost/date_time/posix_time/posix_time.hpp>
00030 
00031 #include "Spectrum.hpp"
00032 #include "FFTProcessor/Filter.hpp"
00033 #include "FFTProcessor/Result.hpp"
00034 #include "FFTProcessor/Proxy.hpp"
00035 
00036 namespace Action {
00037   class PhaseDifferentiation : public Base {
00038   public:
00039     typedef Filter::WithRMS<double, frequency_vector> filter_type;
00040     typedef filter_type::vector_type PhaseSpectrum;
00041     typedef boost::posix_time::ptime ptime;
00042 
00043     PhaseDifferentiation(const boost::property_tree::ptree& config)
00044       : Base("SpectrumInterval")
00045       , ps_(config.get<double>("fMin"), 
00046             config.get<double>("fMax"))
00047       , filterDiffPhase_(Filter::LowPass<PhaseSpectrum>::make(1.0, config.get<double>("Filter.TimeConstant")),
00048                          Filter::LowPass<PhaseSpectrum>::make(1.0, config.get<double>("Filter.TimeConstant")), 
00049                          1.0)
00050       , resultKey_(config.get<std::string>("Name"))
00051       , plotSpectrum_(config.get<bool>("PlotSpectrum", false)) {}
00052 
00053     virtual ~PhaseDifferentiation() {}    
00054 
00055     std::string resultKey() const { return resultKey_; }
00056     bool plotSpectrum() const { return plotSpectrum_; }
00057     static double mod1(double x) {
00058       return ((x>1.) ? x-1. :
00059               (x<0.) ? x+1. : x);
00060     }
00061     virtual void perform(Proxy::Base& p, const SpectrumBase& s) {
00062       using namespace boost::posix_time;
00063       try {
00064         const double dt(  double((p.getApproxPTime() - t_).ticks())
00065                         / double(time_duration::ticks_per_second()));
00066         if (ps_.empty()) {
00067           ps_.fill(s, std::arg<double>);
00068           t_= p.getApproxPTime();
00069         } else {
00070           PhaseSpectrum psNew(ps_.fmin(), ps_.fmax(), s, std::arg<double>);          
00071           PhaseSpectrum diffPhaseNew((psNew-ps_) / (2*M_PI)); // 2*pi = 1
00072           diffPhaseNew.apply(mod1);
00073           if (filterDiffPhase_.x().empty()) {
00074             filterDiffPhase_.init(p.getApproxPTime(), diffPhaseNew);
00075           } else {
00076             filterDiffPhase_.update(p.getApproxPTime(), diffPhaseNew);
00077           }
00078           ps_ = psNew;
00079           t_= p.getApproxPTime();
00080         }
00081         // call virtual method
00082         proc(p, s, 
00083              filterDiffPhase_.x(), 
00084              filterDiffPhase_.rms(), 
00085              dt);
00086       } catch (const std::exception& e) {
00087         LOG_WARNING(e.what());
00088       } catch (...) {
00089         LOG_WARNING("PhaseDifferentiation::perform unknown error");
00090       }
00091     }
00092 
00093     // this method can be overwritten
00094     virtual void proc(Proxy::Base& p, 
00095                       const SpectrumBase& s,
00096                       const PhaseSpectrum& ps,
00097                       const PhaseSpectrum& psrms,
00098                       double dt) {
00099       for (unsigned u=0; u<ps.size(); ++u)
00100         std::cout << "  --- " << dt << " " << ps[u].first << " " << ps[u].second << " " << psrms[u].second << std::endl;
00101     }
00102     
00103   protected:
00104   private:
00105     PhaseSpectrum ps_;        //
00106     ptime         t_;         // time when ps_ was taken
00107     filter_type filterDiffPhase_;
00108     const std::string filterType_;
00109     const std::string resultKey_;
00110     const bool plotSpectrum_;
00111   } ;
00112 } // namespace Action
00113 
00114 #endif // _FFT_ACTION_PHASE_DIFFERENTIATION_HPP_cm101106_
